content: you ll love how easy it is to create this stunning crochet throw featuring the open and airy solomon s knot crochet stitch created in bernat blanket this cushy option is the perfect way to enjoy a light layer of warmth during warmer months crocheted with strategically placed single_crochet and chain stitches this wonderful pattern is easy to follow and works up quickly into a plush lacy fabric it s an inviting throw that looks and feels divine so curl up under this cozy blanket
